comments.author: Robert Muir
comments.body:
heres an svn diff from my merge (for whatever use that is).

This also backports SOLR-2378 (the FST suggester)

I plan to commit shortly.

description:
It would be nice to develop a plan to expose the autosuggest functionality to Lucene users in 3.x

There are some complications, such as seeing if we can backport the FST-based functionality,
which might require a good bit of work. But I think this would be well-worth it.
